titles.title: A bill to amend the National Preservation Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 2/26/1987--Introduced. Amends the National Historic Preservation Act of 1966 to extend for three years, through FY 1990, the funding of the Historic Preservation Fund.
